components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Glo Network in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Glo Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Glo Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 September 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 25 September 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in Germany, Tajikistan, Poland, Greece, Belgium, Israel, Thailand, Ukraine, South Africa, Iran, Cyprus, Bulgaria, Afghanistan, Spain, Ethiopia, Iraq and Mongolia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 25 September 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Germany, Tajikistan, Poland, Greece, Belgium, Israel, Thailand, Ukraine, South Africa, Iran, Cyprus, Bulgaria, Afghanistan, Spain, Ethiopia, Iraq and Mongolia handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 30 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 03 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
09 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 09 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
11 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 11 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
16 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 16 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
18 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 18 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
23 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
25 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 25 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
30 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 30 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
